name: UpdateEnvironmentFolder
description:
Update a specific folder in an environment project.

This tool updates the details of a persisted folder within a specified environment project. It should be called when modifications to folder settings or contents are needed in a given environment.

parameters.name: folder_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the Persisted Folder to update.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: String ID of the project to access. Retrieve by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the folder to be updated in the environment.

parameters.name: folder_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the folder: 'home' for Home, 'pinned' for Pinned.

parameters.name: folder_creation_date
parameters.description: The date and time when the folder was created, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-10-12T14:23:30Z').

parameters.name: folder_update_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating when the folder was last updated. Expected in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: folder_protocol_type
parameters.description: Specifies the protocol type for accessing the folder. Must be a string.

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.description: The path of the folder within the environment project to update.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this Persisted Folder.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this Persisted Folder.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
